data.message: AWESOME..Great Job.. can this be posted to my time line and saved?? a lot of things i save i can never find. maybe in 2016 you can come up with a file system for us to save our pics,recipes, and special family post. just a thought regardless i'll never leave... :)

replies.message: Hey Jodie. You can actually save links, places, articles, videos and other things on Facebook! When you save things, they'll appear in your Saved Items, where only you can see them. To learn how to view and share the things you've saved, visit http://on.fb.me/1NPUN7P. Let us know if you have other questions. :) -Jordan

Facebook Hello FB

 i found this problem for my ID

My inbox is can't connect and reload loop show white screen again

Plz Help me +____+
Thanks FB for letting me stay in touch with family and friends and new faces to share everything with, Merry Christmas!!⛄
Hi Jody. Go to share with friends there is a forward arrow hit it and it will bring up several ways to go hit on only me and post it will post on your line.
